name: Kedai Nanu
address: Jl. Raya Padonan No.53, Tibubeneng, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
The ambiance is very welcoming and charming. A small local restaurant with great service, food, and overall great experience!. Huge variety of affordable food to choose from & side dishes are delicious as well. And Kids friendly that's all matter to me.
We are so fortunate to have this place just a few minutes drive away from home. Definitely a go-to place when you are around Padonan! (It's a hidden place by the way).
review 2: If you want a good food with affordable price, look no further üôåüèΩ foods came so quick too, I‚Äôll definitely come back again!
review 3:
The place is great!  Clean, shady and quiet, equipped with play ground and a chill music play list.
Good service, friendly and not too long.
The food and drinks didn't suit my taste (lychee yakult was very sweet but will try other menus next time) except hot cappuccino, it was perfect for me))
review 4: Good spot to bring the kids because the got a FREE playground. Food was decent. Service was great. Waiters are very attentive and friendly. They got a live music too. Need more parking space.
review 5: Overall was good, nice place & tasty food, maybe suggestion for food to take away better put some condiment like sauce & cutlery for eat. Must to have equipment on the table e.g bell for order or to call the server

name: United Colors of Bali
address: Canggu, Kuta Utara, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
This is a quiet and peaceful gem in a busy Canggu. We enjoyed our stay in the comfy villa. The beds are comfortable and it had everything we need. It is in traditional Balinese style which means the living room is an open area. There's a safe upstairs, but we felt comfortable leaving our stuff in the open room. You have a private garden and you can close the gate, but you can't lock. Which was totally fine by us.

Ofcourse you might run into some ants and small lizards. People who complain about that, don't understand the concept of being in the tropics. It comes with the territory. But everything was spot on clean. The cleaner who comes everyday even does your dishes.

The pool is clean too. Staff is super friendly. There's staff on site 24/7. In the evening and night there's security.

We recommend staying here. Our kids loved it too.
review 2: We stayed in a villa which is in a different part of the property. Villa was good. You have to remember that this is a 2 star property and it certainly delivers value. The attention to detail is very good. Staff are great. It is far enough outside of Canggu to be peaceful. The only thing if it is important to you is that you cannot lock any doors, but it wasn't an issue.
review 3: Really friendly staff (the local staff at least), and set up is nice. Rooms are very dated and not well maintained. No water pressure in showers and overall a dirty feel. Multiple kids were sick in the hotel, which was most likely because of the pool. Would not go again.
review 4: Really enjoyed our stay here, super friendly and highly accommodating staff. The rooms are super comfortable and I like that it is away from the noise and traffic of the major streets. The breakfast at the cafe was a delicious way to start every day. Highly recommended.
review 5: I had a great time at united colors of Bali! The rooms are clean and the services are excellent! If you need peace and quiet this place is for you! Massage, breakfast, salsa yoga class at the top!

name: Arganta by Nerus
address: Jl. Raya Padonan Gang Sakura No.3, Tibubeneng, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Amazing guesthouse. The staff was so amazing - especially Wayan, Merry, Made and the security guy were outstanding and it felt a bit like family. The rooms got cleaned every single day (!), the prices are more than fair and it was quiet. Would recommend this place !
review 2: We stayed here for a couple of months and the staff is super friendly. Merry, Made, Wayan and also the Security Guy. Everyone takes care if you need something. The rooms are spacious and clean. Very grateful for our time here. We‚Äôll come back for sure. üòä
review 3: Great location. Close to the best gym Wanderlust. Service is amazing, clean room every day!
review 4:
I stayed here for a month went on holiday and came my room was gone.. But promised to get it back.. Waited 1 night and evening I come back room was not available anymore..

After complain about this Mrs. Merry came yelling to me and told me to pack my stuff and leave. She came into my personal space and was super rude.

After my bad experience, the owner met with the manager and only thing they are afraid of is the reputation, not owning the mistake that has been made.
1. The rooms are full with mold. ( they will repaint it constantly to hide it.
2. My jackets and other things where molded big time after my holiday
3. Telling that they are always fully booked and long waiting list but, alot of times rooms are empty for a few days.
4. Noisy at night, no spoons or plates.
5. No space in the kitchen for your stuff everything is taken by the other guest already
review 5: Had a pleasant stay here from 12 Dec 2021 - 9 April 2022. Worth the price, everything was well maintained, good location, and the manager/owner Mrs. Merry was really nice, friendly, and helpful.

name: Asung Guesthouse
address: Jl. Danau Batur No.707, Tibubeneng, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
I was staying there for two months and would always come back.üå∏‚ú®
The room was totally perfect and clean, also the atmosphere in this guesthouse was pretty chilled. The staff was very nice and helpful.üåû
review 2: Asung Guesthouse is the best place to stay in the Canggu. I‚Äôve spent 5 month there and I felt absolutely at home. Staff is so nice, owners are very kind and caring. Bedrooms are very clean and comfy. The garden is beautiful and the whole place is very quiet. Everyone is so respectful to each other here. Can‚Äôt wait to be back !
review 3:
Asung guest house
The property is very nice and in a central location so it‚Äôs easy to get around as long as we have bike or car. It has everything you need there are sharing kitchen with their kitchen set. Also they have clean pool. But the parking area isn‚Äôt spacious. But the staff is super kind and friendly, also very helpful in giving advices. The place is also really clean and u also can going to the beach near the guest house. Highly recommended to everyone
review 4:
The room and place it‚Äôs Self is just amazing super clean and beautiful!
The place is central so u get everywhere super easy!
What I love the most about Asung guesthouse is it‚Äôs Owner and staff‚ô•Ô∏è
The owner is a very kind extremely genuinely guy who truely always helps out and take very good care of his customer ‚ô•Ô∏è
I travel  to Bali since 6 years but this place I‚Äôll never miss to stay at ‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è
Big love and thank u guys for making my time here very comfortable‚ô•Ô∏è
review 5:
Asung is a must, wether you come for a 3 day stay or for a full season. Staff is amazing, rooms are clean everyday, it‚Äôs in a quite quiet area. 7/10 mins from busy Canggu centre.
You‚Äôll definitely fell at home here.

name: Damar Emas Guest House
address: Gg. Pd. Asri No.99x, Tibubeneng, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: At first, we were supposed to stay for 3 nights in the hostel, we finally stayed for 10 nights. This hostel is REALLY awesome. I can't recommend it enough. The big garden is beautiful and cleaned everyday. The staff is sooo kind and helpful, and the manager Nanik is such a gentle woman too. The most expensive bedrooms are pretty, with queen size beds and large bathroom (with hot water). They all have a view on the garden with swimming pool. The atmosphere is so relax and quiet. You have fee breakfast every morning on the terrace in the garden, and free coffee, water and tea all day long. You also have a full-equipped kitchen to cook your own food. After few days, we really felt like home. Highly recommended hostel. I am sure you will not regret it.
review 2:
Second time Damar became our home on Bali! We like this place. Simple room, garden with a pool, shared kitchen and a lot of different people that can become your friends. Friendly, helpful and companionable administrator Nanik ;)
Being honest, i put 4 stars for noise from water pump in the night ))
review 3:
I love this place,  every staff humble and neighbors in there so friendly. Big room,  so clean,  Good Wi-Fi, quite,  you can also rent bikes from them,  not to far from beach or supermarket , they have small gym too if you like do exercise,  big garden,  swimming pool,  kitchen share,  big parking..  I recommend for stay here if you come to Bali.
Cheers üç∫üç∏
review 4: Lovely guest hosue, quiet and private. Simple but comfortable.
review 5: little but nice rooms with wifi, cleaning, hot water and free (yes, free) kopi every morning

name: The Odd Cat Bali (Cat Boarding & Cat Adoption Centre)
address: Bjr kulibul kangin, Jl. Raya Padonan, Tibubeneng, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: We enjoy visiting the Odd Cat Cafe. Staff are really welcoming and take good care of the cats. You are given some food for them and are also able to purchase more. I love that staff really get to know all the cats and their needs. Oh, and the brownies are amazing!!!
review 2:
A wonderful place with so many kitties that were taken from the streets, were taken care of, and are ready to be adopted! I love the idea of this shelter-caf√® so much, and the entrance is free!

I'm super glad my friend and I decided to look up for Cat Caf√®s in Bali. This was such a nice discovery and on the same way as our destination, Tanah Lot, so you can easily fit a visit to this place in the itinerary!

The actual caf√® is quite hidden, but Google maps and the signs on the walls helped us find the way. I suggest parking on the main street and go on foot from there, since the streets are too narrow for a car.

The cats are super adorable and friendly! I believe there are more than 60 cats at the time I'm making this review. Moreover, you can order drinks and food inside for yourself, and for the kitties! The prices are very affordable, and you can always donate for the cats in case you just want to support the caf√®.

Really recommend The Odd Cat Bali!! I wish I could've stayed more, but I'm still happy I visited. Thank you for rescuing the cats, I hope to visit place again if I ever come back to Bali!
review 3:
The nicest experience we have had in Bali and have spent a lot of time here!

The cats are all so friendly and trusting in humans proving how amazingly rehabilitated and well looked after they have been by the lovely staff.

The only downside would be wishing we could take them all home with us
review 4: Love this place! There were a lot of cats and most of them are very friendly. We were greeted by Sara and Dian. The place was quite hidden inside but we managed to find it thanks to Google maps and the signages pasted on the walls. Thank you for rescuing the cats in Bali and I hope to visit The Odd Cat Bali again next time! ü•∞
review 5: Very nice place to chill! Its very hidden, have to walk through alley however there is mini signs to look out for! Please help the cats by making some donation

name: Gereja Katolik Santo Paulus Kulibul
address: Jl. Raya Padonan No.65, Tibubeneng, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Very nice to have this discreet church in the middle of Canggu. I went to the mass at 7 am on Sunday and it was more than full with people sitting outside the church
review 3: Ethnic church, not to big but comfort. Easy access from main road.
review 4:
When I was attending the church

It‚Äôs used balinese language, for you who don‚Äôt understand like me.. it‚Äôs a bit confusing but you can guessing hahaha
review 5: Delicious Javanese food, variety food and unbeatable price

name: Asung 2 Guesthouse
address: Jl. Batan Celagi No.7, Tibubeneng, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: we lived here for 3 months, there is a kindergarten nearby, so this format is not suitable for everyone.  the staff is nice and helpful, cleaning every two days.  very accustomed to asungu, wonderful owner Kartan.  thank you

name: Sari Agung Guest House
address: Jl. Raya Padonan No.41, Tibubeneng, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Super clean, well equipped. The most lovely host and staff. Quaint common area, comfortable rooms. Beautiful stay option.
review 2: I stayed at Sari Agung Guest House for 4 months. The rooms are very comfortable and clean compared to other places I have stayed in Bali and the staff are lovely. The location is very good, the environment beautiful and very peaceful. I highly recommend staying at this guesthouse.
review 3:
The place is peaceful and quiet, with nice friendly staff, who always ready to help you! Rooms are clean and simple. And it takes only 7-10 minutes to get all the strategic places in Canggu.
The price is fair, highly recommend!
review 4: It is notable for its clean and comfortable rooms, friendly staff, and a pleasant environment. This is an excellent place to stay for anyone visiting Bali
review 5: I have stayed in the Guesthouse already twice. It realy feels like home, because the staff is so lovely and helpful. The rooms are nice and clean. 100% recomendation!

name: Wowkiss Surf Hostel
address: Jl. Aseman Bagus Gg. Proan No.55, Tibubeneng, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Very clean hostel.the blanket smell so good and the mattress is comfy.with the price offer,its worth the stay.

name: Amore P√¢tisserie Bali
address: Jl. Raya Padonan No.33, Tibubeneng, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
types: cafe, coffee_shop, breakfast_restaurant, bakery, restaurant, food, store
review 1: Hands down the best bakery in Bali! Can feel the love in every bite ü§ç For sure high quality ingredients too, taste so wholesome and clean. Don‚Äôt know if I can buy cakes if its not from Amore now. Very recommended.
review 2: Staff is amazing, they serve clean tasty free water, great coffee, pastries and food! This will always be on the list to come back to when im in bali!
review 3: If you‚Äôre a solo traveller in Canggu looking for a happy calm spot to work and drink coffee. This is it
review 4: Great quality of coffee. The cheesecake is slightly expensive but it melts in my üëÑ - a slice of heaven indeed!
review 5:
Oh my mouth was in heaven!!!
Delicious toasts (I had salmon one but swapped avo with onions) and the chocolate  cheesecake, hazelnut latte :) the bread itself for toasts is amazing you can just have it plain üòã
Presentation is also amazing
The place itself is chill and cute with some modern art on walls :)
I want to try all sweets now üòã

name: O'zarome
address: Gg. Pd. Asri, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Came here for lunch and was pleasantly surprised with the atmosphere. The restaurant has a really nice laidback holiday vibe. I was here in the afternoon but I feel like it would be lovely in the evening with the lighting.

Got the veggie burger with fries and enjoyed it. They have both a western and Asian veggie option, which is always a plus. The only downside is that they did not have any milk substitutes so I was unable to get a latte. The server was really friendly and instantly made me feel welcomed.
review 2: Best Mie Goreng and Veggie burger on Bali!
review 3:
Was really excited to eat here, it's a beautiful restaurant but the staff training needs improvement. I went in and ordered lunch today  and I was the only person in the restaurant with two waitresses.

Over 50 minutes later my food still hadn't come out.  I asked her to check on my food. Then the waitress looks confused saying oh you want that? I had to walk out was very frustrating.
review 4: I eat here often and I am very satisfied. The food and drinks are great and the service and kitchen staff is excellent. Very calm and beautiful area.
review 5: Very lovely staff, the healthy breakfast was amazingly tasty, the other breakfast options are above Bali standard (but not mind blowing by global standards)

name: NOMAD Tropical Hostel
address: 9585+98H, Jl. Batan Celagi, Tibubeneng, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Perfect....I spent 2 weeks here. Feel comfortable, Very nice hostel to stay with the beautiful view of mountain from the upstair Balcony, The Staff are so so Friendly, Have the private Kitchen so I can Cook whatever I want, Room Clean, Common area beautiful with the pool and I fell fresh everyday when I'm staying here. Thank you!!! And Of Course I Will come back, I'm feel like staying in my home. ‚ù§Ô∏èü•∞
review 2: Great new hostel away from the craziness of the main Canggu streets but 10-15 on scooter from the nightlife and cafes. Great places nearby for food and laundry, also yoga. Really good with 90% of the time. Lovely staff and great owner that takes feedback on.
review 3: The best hostel so far in Canggu Bali. The staff and the owner were so friendly. Clean room, AC, WiFi a perfect for me as digital nomad!  Really high recommend this place if you are in Canggu. Best of the best
review 4:
This place is not just a hostel ü•∞
It‚Äôs new so everything is nice and clean, the pool is amazing and it‚Äôs the perfect place to relax, it‚Äôs really hard to find a hostel in canggu that it‚Äôs not noisy, loud, and all about parties and alcohol so this is the best one it you want a chill place to make beautiful connections, relax, maybe work, and feel part of a family :)
The staff is amazing (especially Viana and Ilham ‚ù§Ô∏è) super friendly, available all the time and happy to help you with everything
Again, this is a big family and everyone that come here end up extending and staying for weeks because of how good it is and of course, it‚Äôs very cheap!

HIGHLY RECOMMENDED ‚ù§Ô∏èüíñ‚ù§Ô∏èüíñ
review 5:
Friendly staff , lovely setting
Good ac and wifi etc
Social areas
Even help get great deals on motorbike
This is home not hostel!

name: Damar Bali Guesthouse
address: Jl. Aseman Bagus No.24A, Tibubeneng, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Owner and his team are big liars. They pretend to reserve a room for you to give it to someone else. Disgusting behaviour
review 2: Rooms are very affordable, well priced and clean. Plus the owner Agung and staff are very humble, kind and accommodating
review 3: Nice place. Good parking. Very clean and spacious. Includes kitchen. No traffic around here. Very quiet. Swimming pool is beautiful.
review 4: The place is amazing. My mom stayed there for some days and was satisfied with everything. The pool is clean, the room is full of light and good furnished. They have a large area where you can do yoga or have a rest.
review 5:
Stay here more than 8 months when i was living in Bali!! I could say best guesthouse in Canggu area.. big room big swimming pool big garden also the location is very good.. i always tell my friends to stay here and i very recommend you to this place for stay if you come to Bali for short or long stay..
P.s.. the dog is cute too!! Miss boy !! kintamani dogüòâ

name: Bali Shanti Guesthouse
address: Jalan Bantan Kangin , Gang Pudak No 3 Banjar Kalibul Kawan, Canggu, Kuta Utara, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Good new kitchen with lots of space, great staff - there is always smb on reception from 8am till 10pm . Room is not big, but everything is in excellent condition - no insects or mold, new furniture. Pool is maintained every day.
review 2: Such a nice guesthouse, really big rooms, great price, great pool, great kitchen, close enough to canggu but in a nice quiet neighborhood. Staff are really nice and the owner Agung is so kind and helpful! I recommend this place 100%
review 3: Stayed here 3 years ago and returned after the pandemic, as I ride a bike this is my favorite stay in Bali hands down, very quite and clean, friendly and attentive staff, comfortable bed with clean shower (cold shower only), I got a room with a small balcony attached to the room with a nice view, there‚Äôs a shared cooking space with free tea and coffee, each room has its own shelf in the fridge, most of tenants are long term which makes a friendly atmosphere, there‚Äôs a cute swimming pool with few sun beds, in short, the greatest value for money option available in canggu
review 4:
This place is excellent.
I come to Bali every year and last time i discovered this beautiful and cozy guesthouse.
The owner is very friendly and he will help you with everything you need so is the staff.
Staff is there 24hr, kitchen area is great with enough space and also you have free water, coffee and tea and if you dont wanna cook or move u can ask the staff to bring you some food from the Warung next door, the guesthouse has a small pool but very nice pool area.You can just drop your laundry at the reception and within couple of days is ready(also very cheap).
The room are like hotel room and up the 1st floor you have your own balcony.
The location is very good...you can reach everything you need in Canggu in max 5 min with the scooter with the advantage to be out the party area (good for those who also prefer to sleep at night with no sounds).
Staying here its so easy, good for long or short term...enjoy!!
review 5: The most client-oriented GH in Bali!

name: Omah Biu Guesthouse Canggu
address: Gg. Matahari No.55B, Tibubeneng, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: This place is one of a kind. Forever I didn‚Äôt know whether to call it my suite, my hotel, Homestay or just a room? But there was one thing for sure. It felt like home. The owners and staff who look after your needs are beautiful people who make sure your stay here is nothing short of perfect. Not to mention I made a great friend there too with one of the guests. I had everything I needed and then some. The rooms are clean and bright. It‚Äôs a tranquil place where simplicity and beauty meet.
review 2:
Good place to stay, hidden from the street. They have great service giving useful tips about Bali and Nusa Penida. Place is clean, WiFi works, there is hot water as well.
Usually they have motorbikes to rent.
If you want to stay there better book a room, quite often they are fully booked.
review 3: Omah Biu is a hidden gem in Canggu. I stayed there for two days and really recommend the place. For those who like sports, it‚Äôs really close to bali mma, crossfit, and nirvana strength. Galih and Stef are great hosts and they have super friendly dog named ‚Äòeaster‚Äô. Room is clean and I like the mattress a lot, so comfy.
review 4: A very nice and homey place to stay in Canggu.  The room is clean and nicely decorated. Satisfactory at a very affordable price. Very recommended place for guest house.
review 5: Such an amazing place! Beautiful rooms and friendly staff! Would recommend to anyone who wants to experience Canggu in a serene and quiet place :)

name: Amanda JD_Guest House
address: Gg. Pd. Asri No.69, Tibubeneng, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Amazing guest house! Big respect to Nah, who‚Äôs supervising it! We lived in so many places, but this one is definitely such a great value for money; perfect location, it‚Äôs equal distance to batu balong, echo and brawa. Pepito supermarket is just 5 min drive, gym (wanderlust CrossFit) is just 5 min walk! It‚Äôs clean which is so rare for the guest house (they clean every tiny bit in a daily basis). The rooms are nice as well, we stayed in the biggest one, it has big wardrobe, fridge, spacious bathroom!

Thanks Nah, we will always stay here once we‚Äôre in Canggu!
review 2: Clean, comfy, love the kitchen and mini garden ‚ú®

name: Villa Isola Gallinara - The Terrace
address: Tibubeneng, Kuta Utara, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
The location is truly remarkable. Surrounded by rice paddy‚Äôs, it feels like you‚Äôre on your own private resort. Access to the pool area is nice with extra seating to perform work and the possibility to shower outside. Living room, kitchen & bedroom are all quite spacious.

Did not like the comfort level of the sofa. Felt like rearranging my seating position every 10mins.
Toilet seat doesn‚Äôt stay up, which kind of forces you to do it while sitting. Doors to the backyard are very difficult to close.
review 2: I generally agree with P B's review. The photos look nice, but the build quality is poor. Why does that matter? Imagine a thunderstorm night and you heard a banging sound on the roof as if the builders forgot to nail a section of the roof. Enough to make me stay up all night. The door locks are so poor that they can lock you up by accident at random. The glass door next to the kitchen overlooking the pool cannot be fully closed, letting mosquitoes in. Not to mention the road to the villa is extremely small, fitting only one car. Virtually no parking. At this price point, not okay.
review 3:
We stayed in a villa of this complex, they are all the same management.
It was made in the cheapest way possible to maximize profit.

Customers are cash cows and nothing else.

Villa was very dirty and poorly maintained.

Electric system not safe, not connected to the ground.

Definitely not worth the price asked.

On a good note the area is quiet and staff is nice as always in Bali.
review 4: Nice villa, a good location and perfect for couple traveller
review 5: I will stay here again! Amazing place to stay, the place is simple and it's near cafe also

name: Bali Bagus Homestay
address: Jl. Raya Padonan Gang Pilot No.2, Tibubeneng, Canggu, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

name: Villa Enda
address: Jl. Dauh Rurung No.7, Tibubeneng, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: Our week-long stay at this Airbnb was like discovering a treasure trove hidden in plain sight. The three private rooms were cozy cocoons where we could recharge after exploring the wonders of Bali, and the pool was our oasis of calm amidst the excitement. Bruno and Enda were the hosts with the most, treating us like VIP guests in their own slice of paradise. Would recommend 100%.
review 2: Nestled amidst the tropical surfer‚Äôs town Canggu, Villa Enda is an oasis of tranquility and charm. From the moment you step foot inside, you immediately feel at home. The serene ambiance will allow you to completely unwind and recharge. The design is beautiful with every detail meticulously curated to create a sense of effortless elegance. Each corner of the villa tells a story of local craftmanship, from handpicked furniture to the comfortable bedding that promises a restful night's sleep. The villa exudes a feeling of spaciousness, thanks to its clever layout and airy design. The interiors are bathed in natural light ‚Äî casting a soft glow over every room. The outside has a balmy patio with refreshing plunge pool, offering an intimate sanctuary where you can sip your morning coffee or bask in the golden rays of the afternoon sun. The Bougainvillea and Frangipani trees will surround you in a cocoon of lush greenery, providing a sense of seclusion and privacy that is very peaceful. We truly enjoyed every moment spent here. If you‚Äôre looking for a nice place to stay, look no further. It leaves us with memories of an unforgettable stay in the heart of Canggu‚Äôs tropical paradise thanks to the best hosts! We cannot wait to come back here!!
review 3: Super cozy, comfy, and very clean place for a family staycation with worth price. Very recommended and definitely would come again üòäüëå
review 4: Enda is a graceful and very organised host, we have enjoyed her villa very much so! Thank you for your hospitality, we will return
